scenes.background: [Monica] is typing furiously while [Bob] shakes his head, visibly stressed.
scenes.description: 'Weâ€™re still struggling here. Are you sure you can't help a bit more?'

options.text: I'll help a little more, but I can't fully commit.
options.analysis: You agreed to help further, showing empathy but lower self-regulation as you struggled to maintain your boundaries.

options.text: I really can't do more. You need to manage this on your own.
options.analysis: You maintained your boundaries, showing strong self-regulation, but your empathy and motivation to help were lower.

options.text: Maybe there's a middle ground we can find? What exactly do you need?
options.analysis: You sought a compromise, showing good perception and social skills, but your self-regulation and motivation were balanced.
